steps.description: Log in to the ShypBUDDY dashboard and click on the 'Pickup Address' option.
Click on 'Add Address' to begin entering a new pickup address.
Input the required information including Tag Name (e.g., Warehouse Name), Contact Number, and the complete address.
Click on 'Save' to add the pickup address to your account.

outcome: The pickup address will be added successfully to your ShypBUDDY account.
note: Ensure all details are accurate to avoid future delivery issues.
